mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SETICKTB (SETICK_CKEYTICK, SETICK_CUSERNAME, SETICK_CCODFISC, SETICK_GDATCREA, SETICK_GDATSCAD, SETICK_COPERINS, SETICK_GDATAINS, SETICK_COPEUVAR, SETICK_GDATUVAR, SEAPPL_CKEYAPPL) VALUES (#{chiavePrimariaDellaTabellaDeiTicket}, #{username}, #{codiceFiscaleDelDelegatoPersonaFisica}, #{dataCreazioneTickets}, #{dataScadenzaTicket}, #{operatoreInserimento}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{operatoreUltimaVariazione}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{chiavePrimariaDelleApplicazioni} )
mapper.select: SELECT SETICKTB.SETICK_CKEYTICK , SETICKTB.SETICK_CUSERNAME , SETICKTB.SETICK_CCODFISC , SETICKTB.SETICK_GDATCREA , SETICKTB.SETICK_GDATSCAD , SETICKTB.SETICK_COPERINS , SETICKTB.SETICK_GDATAINS , SETICKTB.SETICK_COPEUVAR , SETICKTB.SETICK_GDATUVAR , SETICKTB.SEAPPL_CKEYAPPL FROM SETICKTB WHERE SETICKTB.SETICK_CKEYTICK=#{chiavePrimariaDellaTabellaDeiTicket}

SELECT SETICKTB.SETICK_CKEYTICK , SETICKTB.SETICK_CUSERNAME , SETICKTB.SETICK_CCODFISC , SETICKTB.SETICK_GDATCREA , SETICKTB.SETICK_GDATSCAD , SETICKTB.SETICK_COPERINS , SETICKTB.SETICK_GDATAINS , SETICKTB.SETICK_COPEUVAR , SETICKTB.SETICK_GDATUVAR , SETICKTB.SEAPPL_CKEYAPPL FROM SETICKTB WHERE SETICK_CUSERNAME = #{username} AND SEAPPL_CKEYAPPL = #{applicationId} AND SETICK_GDATSCAD > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND SETICK_CCODFISC = (SELECT SEUSER_CCODFISC FROM SEUTECTB, SECUSTTB WHERE SECUST_CCODCUS = #{customerId} AND SEUTECTB.SEUSER_CUSERNAME = SETICK_CUSERNAME AND SEUTECTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST = SECUSTTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST)

SELECT A1.SETICK_CKEYTICK , A1.SETICK_CUSERNAME , A1.SETICK_CCODFISC , A1.SETICK_GDATCREA , A1.SETICK_GDATSCAD , A1.SETICK_COPERINS , A1.SETICK_GDATAINS , A1.SETICK_COPEUVAR , A1.SETICK_GDATUVAR , A1.SEAPPL_CKEYAPPL FROM SETICKTB A1 WHERE A1.SETICK_CUSERNAME = #{username} AND A1.SETICK_GDATSCAD = (SELECT MAX(B.SETICK_GDATSCAD) FROM SETICKTB B WHERE B.SETICK_CUSERNAME=A1.SETICK_CUSERNAME AND B.SETICK_CCODFISC=A1.SETICK_CCODFISC AND B.SEAPPL_CKEYAPPL=A1.SEAPPL_CKEYAPPL) AND A1.SETICK_CCODFISC = (SELECT SEUSER_CCODFISC FROM SEUTECTB, SECUSTTB WHERE SECUST_CCODCUS = #{customerId} AND SEUTECTB.SEUSER_CUSERNAME = SETICK_CUSERNAME AND SEUTECTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST = SECUSTTB.SECUST_CKEYCUST)

SELECT A1.SETICK_CKEYTICK , A1.SETICK_CUSERNAME , A1.SETICK_CCODFISC , A1.SETICK_GDATCREA , A1.SETICK_GDATSCAD , A1.SETICK_COPERINS , A1.SETICK_GDATAINS , A1.SETICK_COPEUVAR , A1.SETICK_GDATUVAR , A1.SEAPPL_CKEYAPPL FROM SEAPPCTB INNER JOIN SETICKTB A1 ON A1.SETICK_CKEYTICK=#{ticketId} AND A1.SETICK_GDATSCAD=(SELECT MAX(A2.SETICK_GDATSCAD) FROM SETICKTB A2 WHERE A2.SETICK_CKEYTICK=A1.SETICK_CKEYTICK ) INNER JOIN SEUTECTB ON SEUTECTB.SEUSER_CUSERNAME=A1.SETICK_CUSERNAME AND SEUTECTB.SEUSER_CCODFISC=A1.SETICK_CCODFISC
